channel.title: Why does the side keep going down for days on end?
channel.description:
Its the 3rd time its happened. I thought it was over when moparisthebest posted the "Back up!" Topic.
Its gone down twice since then and ive seen no threads about it.. Both time its been off for at least 2-3 days for me.

item.title: Why does the side keep going down for days on end?
item.dc:creator: @xcel_bears xcel bears
item.description:
@xcel_bears wrote:

every time i try to get on its down and i cant even log in on the windows client wich sux ive only played it for like 3 mins didnt even get to ge and now i cant log in on the client. i m not real good with dos or linux but can someone help with that. back to the point of this post try host gator i use them for my sites and they’re great never down and havent bin hacked and the site has bin up for a couple of years. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2009, 11:48:07 pm[/size][hr]hey mopar the hostgator sie is www.hostgator.com i love them apparantly noone has ever hacked people that have hosting with them and theyre prices start at $40 a month. for 2Gb limit but you would need more than that anyway have a look mate. im pretty new would like to get to know you thanks :eek: :rolleyes: :o ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Why does the side keep going down for days on end?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:17, topic:278453”][quote author=Newty link=topic=367530.msg2795195#msg2795195 date=1243030397]

Are you thick? Because that is the silliest and stupidest post i have seen for a while.
Do you not think i know that. Let me explain for you people with a very small mind.

Some people who own sites will just ring their host up and sort it out on the phone… Or threaten to go to another company. Mopar drove all the way down to his datacenter to try and sort it out…

It shows he has alot of time for this place.

Now dont post anymore stupid comments like that again.

You obviously don’t associate with many website owners then. Maybe you just know the moparscape type who can’t drive anyway, so only have one option - to call the host.

And anyway, think of all the adsense mopar would lose out on if he didn’t go sort his host out asap

I dont associate myself with “Moparscapers” Like yourself.

You were a moparscape moderator before, fgt.
[/quote]

And how long is it since i have been there Hmm Fgt?[/quote]

Holy shit you are annoying. For once, find the balls to walk out of an argument instead of retorting in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Why does the side keep going down for days on end?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:11, topic:278453”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=367530.msg2789816#msg2789816 date=1242676751]

Last thursday we came under a heavy attack and I’ve been fighting it since then, I’ve driven to the datacenter twice, configured a firewall, and everything else possible, but the amount of data coming down the line completely clogged it up. Since then I have got a new host with a better company and it shouldn’t go down again.

Good to see someone so dedicated to a site

He’s the owner…
[/quote]

Are you thick? Because that is the silliest and stupidest post i have seen for a while.
Do you not think i know that. Let me explain for you people with a very small mind.

Some people who own sites will just ring their host up and sort it out on the phone… Or threaten to go to another company. Mopar drove all the way down to his datacenter to try and sort it out…

It shows he has alot of time for this place.

Now dont post anymore stupid comments like that again.[/quote]

Stop getting so worked up.

@forum: How long was it down for? I haven’t checked in a while.

Read full topic
